data.why:
HTML-FormEngine is a powerfull module for managing html/xhtml
    forms. Before i wrote this module, i searched on cpan and in google
    for a existing module which would fullfill my needs, but i had no
    success. FormEngine can easily be adjusted and extended, i'm already
    working on an extension which automatically creates a form for
    adding, updating and deleting records to/in/from database tables.
